website_summaries.verdict: For cat owners who use the Feliway diffuser, this is an essential purchase for continuous cat-calming results.
pros: A handy refill that fits the Feliway electric diffuser – an affordable must-have if you have the convenient plug-in unit

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT LAST 30 DAYS -- 20 or LESS!
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this and Comfort Zone ones, and this does NOT last 30 days at all! My first one lasted about 18-20 days max, felt like 15, while the ones from comfort zone are still going, past 30 days. I have 3 plugged in, in different areas to see if they help and will try for 90 days, but I expect Feliway to last AT LEAST 30 days as advertised as they are NOT cheap. Update: added a photo of the refill. Started on 02/21, it's empty on 03/12!
customer_reviews.author: Alessandra G.

customer_reviews.title: Wrong product sent
customer_reviews.text: My issue is not with the product. Feliway is great. I use the multi-cat and classic (one of each, each month). My issue is when ordering off this listing for the single 48 ml refill of Feliway classic. They sent the Feliway Multicat, twice. In order for my system to work, I need to reliably receive what I order so I can consistently use the same thing. I won’t sent it back because I’ll use the multicat eventually, but I’m frustrated because my cats have been thrown off and I can’t find somewhere to reliably get Feliway classic single refills. It also sucks because the multicat is $4 cheaper, so I guess I’ve been ripped off a little.
customer_reviews.author: KJK

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work half the time, and only lasts 2 weeks!
customer_reviews.text: We have ordered a total of 7 of these so far. Not a one has lasted 30 days - they last two weeks. And while the first 6 we ordered did the job, the last one did NOTHING. My cat has howled every single night, all night long. Either quality control on this is not good, or amazon is getting its supply from somewhere other than the manufacturer. This stuff is too expensive to only last half as long as it says, and to sometimes not work at all.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Jones

customer_reviews.title: I swear by this product
customer_reviews.text: There is the Feliway Classic for one cat house and the Feliway multi-cat one as well. Both work great. I have been using them for over a dozen years and they have worked to some extend for each different cat I had. If your cat is nervous this helps calm him/or her down. In a multi-cat house this keeps them calm enough to get along with each other. Of course if you have more then two cats I have no idea what the results would be, but I have found this to be a very helpful product in my house whether it be one crazy zany cat or two active cats. Good luck keeping your kitty purr-- fectly happy.
customer_reviews.author: SmileyAnn

customer_reviews.title: Works to calm cat, but they are empty after 3 weeks
customer_reviews.text: We have used these for almost three months as recommended by our pet behaviorist, to calm our cat and as part of the solution to urinating outside the litter box. We put one near her favorite bedroom sleeping spot and another in the living room (where most of the accidents have been). Huge improvement and she seems calmer, more loving. My only complaint is that they only last three weeks max. It may be because it's winter here and our forced hot air heat is running lots. I'd advise checking them regularly so you know when they need to be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Whiskers Fluffy Cat

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy. This refill ruined the diffuser I purchased through my vet. It overheated and melted the plastic. Awful smell. This was within an hour of plugging it it. Bought a new one through my vet and PetSmart and no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke E.

customer_reviews.title: Made a BIG difference!
customer_reviews.text: This magic little plugin made a huge difference in the mood of my severely cranky cat. I don't know how it works or why, but it made my super mean cat nice and (almost) loving. We are able to pet her now, which is a vast improvement over how we used to live. She seems calmer and less bothered by everything. She sleeps in common rooms now, rather than running off and hiding for days. Big improvement!
customer_reviews.author: mama of 3

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work!
customer_reviews.text: I brought a new kitty home from the shelter and he immediately started acting like he was marking (even though nothing actually happened). I didn't want to wait until he actually DID start successfully spraying, so I tried this. It seems to have curbbed his behavior! I'm grateful, but it also seems a bit pricey and has to be replaced frequently. Although it is certainly better than the alternative.
customer_reviews.author: k-flo

customer_reviews.title: Plug and play, does its job
customer_reviews.text: literally twist this into the defused that plugs into the wall (sold separately) and walk away. It's that simple. It usually lasts us about 30 days and it seems to calm the cata down quite a bit. We have one that gets stressed and tense by nature, he picks fewer fights with his brother when we use this. It does not completely eliminate his anxiety, but no product can. This one is the best we have found and we have been using it regularly for about a year now, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: CrimsonAngel

customer_reviews.title: I think this works...
customer_reviews.text: I think we could see some difference while using this, but aren't 100% sure. We bought the starter kit at our local vet & thought it was worth getting a second starter kit & a refill, but now that this kitty doesn't hang out in just one place any longer we have stopped using them. The other factor is our second cat has passed, so there isn't that tension any longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It Helps
customer_reviews.text: We have a unusual situation. We have 2 cats and my son got himself a kitten about 6-8 months before moving out on his own. We have one cat that is very sensitive. She has never excepted the kitten, who is now 2 yrs. My son brings his cat every time he visits. My sensitive cat gets incredibly stressed every time, and it has gotten so bad, she gets stressed even when my son comes home without his cat. The feliway helps. If we don't have it plugged in she is super aggressive and no one can get near her. With the feliway she is calmer but still hisses and growls, but is a bit more consolable.
customer_reviews.author: TLL

customer_reviews.title: Great for getting used to a new home!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff actually works! I had bought the spray many years ago for my cat while in her carrier and it did nothing. When we moved to a new house she was yoweling a lot at the top of the stairs and my vet recommended I give this a try! Now we have a subscription! The yoweling stopped and shes so much happier in her new home. The price does fluctuate though which is annoying. I may stop using it and see what happens with her behavior now that shes settled in.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: We were part of the product testing for this item. It works
customer_reviews.text: Multi cat household, and one is a bully. This stuff just works. He is still a bit of a bully, just not as bad as without. What we found is 'the girls' are more likely to ignore him, or stand up to him. Like all bully's, he will back down :). We have found that all 3 cats are more affectionate than before. Hardly saw the girls before we started to use this. The change in behavior is small, but makes a huge difference. Does not make them lethargic, or impact eating. You would not know that you are using it, unless you knew how they reacted in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn A. Blough

customer_reviews.title: It caught on fire!!!
customer_reviews.text: This caught on fire and was smoking and sparking. Luckily I saw the smoke coming from the wall and ripped it out before it caught my house on fire. If I wasn't home it would've burned my house down and likely killed the cats I bought it to help. Horrible dangerous product!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Totally Satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: My cats do not get along. One is approx. 12 the other 4. The older one hisses if the other one is 2 feet away. I was totally amazed at how calm both cats were after plugging in Feliway. At first I thought maybe I was imaging it. After 5 days not once has my older kitty hissed at the younger one. They seem totally content being in the same room. I cannot comment on how long the bottle lasts because I've only had it plugged in for 5 days. There is no scent what-so-ever.
customer_reviews.author: Thelma

customer_reviews.title: Two happy cats
customer_reviews.text: I took in my two foster kitties as a bonded pair, but after they'd been with me about 6 weeks they suddenly started fighting all the time. And the younger one was constantly agitated, to the point of attacking us. I found my old diffuser plug and ordered the refill. In 3 days the boy had stopped attacking us, and by the fifth day they are sleeping together again. It's not perfect yet, but it's so much better! Thank you feliway!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: calms stressed out cats without sedation
customer_reviews.text: I used this in conjunction with the spray when I was gone for several days getting surgery. Even though he had other family members around, the change stressed him out, but this diffuser and the spray helped calm him without sedation. I also used it when I first brought him home and right after he was neutered. I highly recommend it to anybody who anticipates a stressful situation for their pet. It’s also a tool for cats who are aggressive or scared and bitey. They may just be stressed out and this is certainly a less heartbreaking option than trying to rehome them.
customer_reviews.author: RedheadwalkingTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: This works better than its diluted counter part comfort zone
customer_reviews.text: This works better than its diluted counter part comfort zone. Do your research and make sure you have why your really wanting. Wishing I had spent the extra bucks for this one long ago. My part wild is so cuddly now and her sister has much less separation anxiety. They are also playing together some for the first time in five years.
customer_reviews.author: M. L. Gaumer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t help
customer_reviews.text: It didn’t have any effect on my cat. His brother recently died and he has anxiety over it as do I. I had hoped this would work but no. I tried twice
customer_reviews.author: jrc1971

customer_reviews.title: I was skeptical at first....
customer_reviews.text: When my boyfriend told me about some magic air freshener type deal I was skeptical. He bought it a week later when get got a new kitten because his cat doesn’t like other animals. It was a rough week before it. LET ME TELL YOU it was like day and night. His cat is so relaxed now it’s unbelievable. I recently just bought it because we are dog sitting and she HATES dogs and hides. She’s like a new cat. She’s happy and hanging out with us. Definitely recommend. Tip: if you’re bringing a new pet in the home I’d put this in about a week beforehand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my cat from peeing outside the box
customer_reviews.text: ***Update: the price is back to normal (around $12) and the most recent refill I ordered is working fine. Amazon reimbursed me for the defective product. The last two refills I ordered have been defective. The wicking stick didnt work. It just dried up inside the diffuser and the fluid just sat in the bottle. The recent price increase makes me extra upset. This product had really been helping my cat's behavior issues, but now he's back to his old tricks and I am out $30. The lot number on the bottles is 459A1
customer_reviews.author: ShibaMum

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra cost over other brands
customer_reviews.text: I used to use the Comfort Zone with Feliway because it was less expensive. However, like many of the other owners that have reviewed I found it to be useless. I have a cat that gets separation anxiety and therefore inappropriately urinates. The Comfort Zone product did nothing to alleviate this issue. As soon as I put in the Ceva Feliway my kitty calmed down and stopped inappropriately urinating all over the place.
customer_reviews.author: MacGyver

customer_reviews.title: Is it better than Comfort Zone?  Don't know.......
customer_reviews.text: I have quite a few cats, and they are not all friends, unfortunately. I've always had one of these scent things, although this is the first time I've intentionally spent significantly more for the Feliway. original brand. (Amazon sells these nice little boxes with six bottles of the Comfort Zone brand.) However, I saw a study somewhere that found that the Feliway brand was more effective. Truthfully, so far, I haven't noticed much difference, but I never give up hope.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda

customer_reviews.title: Fire hazard
customer_reviews.text: The stick came burnt. Even my old one that had been plugged in a little too long wasn’t so burnt. Awful fire hazard.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Leonard

customer_reviews.title: check prices and quantities before ordering
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to tell if this worked, perhaps it did. My cats are getting along better. However on August 29, 2019 I bought a 2-pack for $11.81. Today I looked to re-order and the description changed from 2-pack to single and the price is now $18.54 - that's a 214% increase or more than 3 times the amount I paid just 2 months ago. Seems a bit ridiculous. Chewy sells a multi-pack for less (almost 25% less per bottle)... it's unusual for them to be less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm on the fence
customer_reviews.text: I have fostered many cats, and have one of my own. These plug ins are suggested to ease bad behavior and stress, but honestly I think they are a gimmick. I keep buying refills but don't ultimately ever see much of a change in any of the cats I've had. I am finally going to stop buying them, I don't have any proof that they work or don't. It seems ineffective and they are pricey! Wish they worked, because I hate seeing a stressed kitty :(
customer_reviews.author: michellebell685

customer_reviews.title: This Refers to the Plug-In Diffuser Part - Not the Refill
customer_reviews.text: I was not allowed to review the diffuser, which I bought several years ago, so i'm doing it here. The prongs on the plug-in are both skinny, so the diffuser is not stable in the outlet! I don't know why Felway doesn't manufacture the correct modern prongs but there it is. I have McGyvered it with masking tape so it adheres to the outlet without blocking the vents of the diffuser...so far so good. As far as I can tell, the refill product works fairly well to calm the cat. He is still a little anxious but not unruly.
customer_reviews.author: niftynina

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Work
customer_reviews.text: I've tried this on three cats over the years and it doesn't work. I tried it again at my veterinarian's suggestion for my current cat who is grieving the loss of my other cat. I told my vet that it doesn't work, but I'd try it again since he's suggesting it. No luck. It's expensive and a waste of money. All cats are different so perhaps it works on some. I have yet to know of anyone personally who has had success with it, so I would suggest not wasting your money.
customer_reviews.author: SunKira

customer_reviews.title: Happy Kitty
customer_reviews.text: The Feliway Classic Diffuser Refill for Cats makes my kitty happy - it helps him with anxiety in times of change, putting him into a state of comfort. It doesn't make him drowsy or lethargic - and against all hopes, it doesn't make him more cuddly. That said, the smell emanating from the diffuser is not noticeable and I haven't had any issues with the diffuser thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: the jury is still out
customer_reviews.text: I bought feliway to, hopefully, stop my mature cat from urinating on the carpet. At the same time i put two brand new litter boxes in the middle of the room (where she has been carpet peeing). Which one works? I did spot her soiling the carpet the other day shortly after the feliway was empty (the litter in the boxes was a little old too). I've replaced the litter and the feliway and she's back using the litter box. I guess i'll continue to purchase feliway and make sure her litter is super clean. I don't know if it works but i'll keep buying.
customer_reviews.author: Lori C. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Honestly not sure how effective this is.
customer_reviews.text: We have three cats. One of them is newly adopted, so we bought Feliway at our vet's suggestion to ease the transition from two to three felines in our household. Months and several bottles of Feliway later, our new cat constantly chases and harasses our female, who now hides all the time and seems understandably stressed; and our other cat, who seems to get along with the new one pretty well, periodically poops and pees on the carpet. So, yeah. Not sure if this has been as effective as we'd like. On the other hand, maybe they'd all act out worse without it.
customer_reviews.author: Serendipitous

customer_reviews.title: Feliway Classic Diffuser
customer_reviews.text: I have gifted and purchased this product several times. I really cannot say there is any difference in cat behavior. Value for the money IS competitive. I do not notice a scent which IS acceptable. 5 stars for comfort because it is NOT affecting my cat(s) in a negative manner such as nausea or frequent trips to litter box, that is a positive. I have not had feedback from others that say it does not help.
customer_reviews.author: Smiley

customer_reviews.title: Not loving the open box
customer_reviews.text: I order these refills all the time. This is the first time that I received it in an opened box. It looks like someone tore the bottom open, and I'm not sure how or why. It made me a little suspicious, but the cap was screwed on and the refill looked full, so I suppose it's okay. My vet recommended I use this product for my flutd cat, and it seems to work well.
customer_reviews.author: HipHopGrl

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if it works but worth a shot
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure if these things actually work. I bought them for my cat because he was anxious about our dog. I used this with a combination of other products to help reduce his anxiety so it’s hard to know if it was this product that helped or not. Other reviews mentioned that their diffuser would emit a plastic burning smell but I never had that issue. My recommendation would be to change it as soon as it’s empty.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: When I had 2 kitties, who came from the same selective rescue society, I had no problems. But then I brought home a kitten from the vet's office. Giving rescues a home has been important in my life, but this did create a problem. This product does exactly what it says it will do. Life became much calmer (I did have to use 2 at a time because of open spaces), but it is well worth the money to have a peaceful home.
customer_reviews.author: Bonita Balla

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last a full month - No noticeable difference in marking behavor
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately after buying six diffuser refills there is still no change in my cat's marking behavior. Both cats continue to urinate in the house as frequently as before I started using the diffusers. The diffusers also don't last a full month, they last about 3 weeks. One cat has maybe gotten friendlier towards us, but he never had any attitude issues to begin with so I can't say for sure. I really wish these worked.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Very easy, only animal detects scent, no noise
customer_reviews.text: You don't notice this after plugged in but I think it does help calm my cat. Stock up as each diffuser only lasts about a month. Set a reminder because when its gone it will start to look burned. I got the starter pack which has the part that plugs into wall along with bottle to screw on to it. Then I order refills. Just hang on to the original wall part. For more than 1 room you will need a other plug in part.
customer_reviews.author: Kath

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these diffusers for the last 3 years, since we adopted our second cat. I can definitely tell when they run out because my younger cat starts picking on the older one. I have 4 total in my house (2 story, 2400sf), 3 of the regular and one of the multi-cat. I replace the actual diffuserd every 9-12 months because I have found they don't work as well much longer than that.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Williams

customer_reviews.title: Must have for anxious cat or multiple cats
customer_reviews.text: I have 5 cats and they were having issues. After having a couple of these plugged in for a few days I noticed some subtle differences. My cats quit jumping out of their skin with loud noises, they seemed to just be s bit more relaxed. You do have to make sure you change the plugs about every 6 months or so, they get hot but I’ve never had one get so warm it’s melted anything. I get the subscription because of the calming effect on The kitties!
customer_reviews.author: Tami

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy from amazon
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased this product from petsmart and was very happy with the results. I had a cat that kept urinating out of the box and on random items in my home. I ordered the refill from amazon as it was cheaper however within 1 day of changing my cat immediately started peeing all over again. Very frustrated. Will buy from petsmart again and hopefully it will work again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of the most important items in our house
customer_reviews.text: Ive used this product off and on for years. Off, only because I would forget to check the diffusers and then forget to order a refill. I have these on subscription so now I dont have to worry about running out and you cant beat the price compared to the big name stores. This does actually work! If you dont keep up with it however the cat may mark somewhere, but once you get more it stops so its a miracle!
customer_reviews.author: MiSsA

customer_reviews.title: Plug in does work to keep cat calm. No scratching, still sprays in the house a little.
customer_reviews.text: This item helped to keep my cat calm. I have been transitioning him to be a indoor cat, no more outside time. It's true I dont smell anything this item puts out. My cat still mark's territory in the house but not as much as without this plug-in, he is calmer. I dont see him scratching hardly at all. I also have him wearing a calming collar. For the money this is a affordable solution. It's been a month and I will continue this as a way of life.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley R.

customer_reviews.title: No Help For My Cat
customer_reviews.text: I am in an apartment so the package said it would cover the square footage, but I saw no difference in my 2 year old cat. She still scratches every door and runs wild until she gets tired and sleeps several hours. She does use her cardboard scratching slide but must continually scratch every door. I had bought a refill, so I will move it to a different area and hope it works.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Cameron

customer_reviews.title: WINNER PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Our vet told us to try this after our cat literally attacked our neighbor in our house. Apparently, she gets over-stimulated. We rescued her from college students who would tease her. She's a love, but was so used to this that it's her first reaction. Then we got this, and gave her her own "safe space". She's still full of spirit but Thanksgiving was yesterday and no one got "nailed".
customer_reviews.author: Love MUSIC

customer_reviews.title: Back to a happy home, thank you.
customer_reviews.text: The ease of use makes this a great item for everyone. We have a 16 yr old cat with a thyroid problem that made her anxious. She wouldn’t take the prescription we got so we tried this. It has worked better than expected. You don’t even know it’s there, plug it in and change refills once a month (we like being on auto ship), that’s it! Our home is much happier thanks to this product.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Wildberger

customer_reviews.title: Be very careful of over heating
customer_reviews.text: This does seem to help my cats a lot, specifically my five year old neutered male cat but please keep an eye on the plug. I don't have pictures right now but I have had two plugins and both over heated. I smelled something burning, like a burning plastic, and the plug in itself was hot to the touch and smoke was coming from where the refill goes into the plug in.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Works like magic!
customer_reviews.text: I got this product for my cat, who was having anxiety due to changes in the household. Sounds silly, I know, but it’s real. He was peeing around the house instead of in his litter box. I took him to the vet to check for any physical causes first, but everything was fine. The Feliway worked almost immediately. He did not pee outside the litter box once since we plugged the diffuser in. I was skeptical, but it works like magic!
customer_reviews.author: Maggiegyver

customer_reviews.title: WORKS!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuffs simply works! Had a cat peeing everywhere and this is the only thig that can control her. There expensive yes but it does work. We tried everything and the felliway product is the only thing that works. Only draw back is it doesn’ast a full 30 Days and as soon as that’s empty and I don’t notice she’s pissing on the floor. It’s insane how well this product works for us!
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Not good for territorial issues between cats. Won't help.
customer_reviews.text: Something spooked our neutered male cats into hating each other for weeks. They became very territorial and hated each other during that time. This was supposed to help them become more calm in their "safe" areas, but we didn't notice any changes, even 2 weeks in. So we stopped using it. 2 weeks later they resolved the issue on their own. Don't bother spending money, unless you are just trying to get a new cat acquainted to a new home.
customer_reviews.author: Sheridan

customer_reviews.title: Worth a try
customer_reviews.text: Odorless and easy to use. I think it helps? Our cat began to not use his litter box. Vet said no health issues and he’s not old. We changed up everything: new litter, deterrents in his favorite forbidden zone, and Feliway. Something worked bc he is back to using his box and we’re keeping up with everything including the Feliway bc we don’t want a relapse!
customer_reviews.author: C. Zamorano

customer_reviews.title: Stoped going outside the box
customer_reviews.text: Our youngest male cat was going outside the box after a year of being in our home. We had both he and his sister checked out at the vet and both were healthy. So we got plug ins for the rooms where their litter boxes were. The going outside the box stopped day one. I will continue to buy them as long as he keeps up his end of the bargain!
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: Calms and relaxed cats
customer_reviews.text: Feliway 30 day diffuser works wonders for my Tortie. She has separation anxiety from me and also does not like seeing any cats outside. She used to per everywhere but this product has tamed her down s lot. She still has some issues but not like it was before. Great product and it came boxed with no leaking issues. I did receive this as a free product but after I received one sample I bought another package since it helped.
customer_reviews.author: karla smith

customer_reviews.title: This was recommended by my vet to me and has been a ...
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended by my vet to me and has been a godsend. My little kitty Luna suffers from separation anxiety as well as crazy "midnight friskies"! I have noticed a huge difference since we started using this. Should would scratch at the door after my partner and I would leave almost to the point her paws would bleed and this is no longer the case. Her midnight crazies are also less frequent and last less time. I have no doubt that this is due to our use of the Feliway as we ran out of it once (and never again!) her symptoms immediately started again. Can't recommend enough!
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Grateful it’s working
customer_reviews.text: So far the Feliway diffuser is working! Have one in each of two rooms. Two weeks so far no peeing from my male cat. Was afraid I’d have to Re home him. Keeping fingers crossed but haven’t done the 40 day replacement yet.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin C.

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be working
customer_reviews.text: Pricey for liquid that lasts only 30 days, but i guess you're also paying for the bottle. i have 2 cats who hate each other, and it seems to bring a little peace to the household. I'm not entirely convinced it's the liquid, rather than time (it's been over 3 years), but it sure is nice to hear less hissing.
customer_reviews.author: K. ZavarinTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: The vet used this on my very scared kitty who would not let anyone touch him. They kept him in his carrrier and sprayed some Feliway on a blanket and covered his carrier with it. Let him sit in it for 10 minutes and voila! He let them cut his nails and examine him for his checkup. I bought some to keep at home when he needs to chill. Very happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: Pausing

customer_reviews.title: Great for moving or prepping for guests!
customer_reviews.text: I always use Feliway when moving, or before I have guests staying over for a period of time.Setting it up ahead of time really helps your cat feel safe in the new or changing environment. Helps my cats adjust to the changes quick and feel right at home regardless of the confusion and changes taking place. It really saved us for my last move (over 10 hours away from old home), and I would and have recommend it to anyone with kitties.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree

customer_reviews.title: Life Is Easier For Everyone
customer_reviews.text: This is a life saver! One of our cats is a nervous Nelly (for unknown reasons) and this made our move much easier. We also used it near the litterbox when he first moved in and was introduced to his now brother/bff. Keep in a small space that the cat uses so the scent won't dissapate. Has absolutely no scent to humans.
customer_reviews.author: radrachelleigh

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used feliway many times before but this time the wick seems to be broken on mine. It has been plugged in for 25 days and none of it is used. The wick is stark dry and very hot to the touch, possibly a fire hazard. Will not buy from this supplier again.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Johnson

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I have a newly adopted 2-1/5 year old female rescue kitty. She came to me frightened (her original owner had died & she was placed in a foster home with other animals & children). I got her July 5th and the Feliway Classic has helped to calm her and begin to trust me. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: roberta tiner nelms

customer_reviews.title: Recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: I rescued a cat from local shelter, becuz I had to put my cat to sleep mast tumour he was dying. New cat, was very scared and hid under the bed. She doesn't like loud noises. This product is a life saver. After 2 weeks my new cat came out from hiding and was more calm, sociable. I used for a month, because she's calmer now. I'm not getting paid for this review it's my honest comment that I saw I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Drummond

customer_reviews.title: It Works!!
customer_reviews.text: My 16 year old anxious kitty has finally calmed down thanks to this! How do I know this is the reason she calmed down? She became anxious again & I ordered a refill, plugged it in & a day or so later, she’s calm & sleeping in a chair near this Feliway diffuser. This is a product that we can’t live without. My older kitty meows constantly & won’t settle down but with the Feliway diffuser, she is so much better.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: This was first recommended by my vet when my cat started over grooming himself from unexplained anxiety. I definitely notice a difference in his stress levels when I have this plugged in as opposed to when I don't. My cat doesn't have serious behavioral problems, so not sure how this works for more serious cases but it works wonderful for the mild stresses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! This really works
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my three cats calm and collected. My Calico is very sensitive and I needed something to calm her down around two other male cats. The diffuser refills are pricey, but I use peanut smart plugs with Smartthings on a schedule. The diffuser lasts a lot longer on a schedule with Smartthings.
customer_reviews.author: Rox

customer_reviews.title: Plastic gets hot, but keeps kitties calm and happy
customer_reviews.text: I put this in the room where my cats spend most of their time and it might be all in my head, but this really does seem to keep them calm. Much less fighting between the boys. The plastic gets pretty hot, which worries me, but so far I haven’t had any issues and I’ve been using the same plug in adaptor for a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Amy D.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for high-strung kitties
customer_reviews.text: I recently moved and my cat, Callie, was all over the place hiding and sneaking up on her food to eat. Once I got 2 of these plugged in, 1 upstairs and 1 dwnstrs, she was stretching out on her cat tree, and/or sitting on my lap purring. It was amazing to me to see the difference it made in her behavior.
customer_reviews.author: LinDee

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: Worked so well for my cat. She would get stressed and urinate in one corner in the house.. a week of this product being plugged in and we had no more issues. Replaced carpet and my home as been safe from urine! my cat is 13 years old, this product has put my mind at ease with her spraying, etc. I cannot love this product more than I do!
customer_reviews.author: Brooklyn Brady

customer_reviews.title: Feliway is wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I have 7 cats. All indoor kitties. They each started out as fosters and I ended up keeping each one over time. They are 2 tiger striped, 3 black and white, 1 orange and 1 flame point Siamese (named Snowball). The cats were picking on the Siamese and my vet suggested Feliway plug ins. I ordered 2 and within 2 weeks all was good in kitty land. No more stalking or bullying of Snowball. I've reordered and am on my second set of Feliway. Best stuff!! Works and well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Mellie

customer_reviews.title: This did not work for us. Cats still fought.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as recommended by my veterinarian. We introduced a kitten into our house with a 6 yr old cat in residence. We read about the product and bought it hoping for the best as the 2 cats were fighting at every chance. We did everything the instructions said to have it work optimal ly. This product made no difference to our household. I would not buy it again. I felt it was overpriced and now I have a diffuser which is unused sitting in a drawer.
customer_reviews.author: robin dalton

customer_reviews.title: Eh, its ok.
customer_reviews.text: I used to use this when I had a handful of cats in my household. I now only have one and I started using this to help my cat get used to being home alone. She still howls in the morning but maybe her daytime anxiety is not as bad. But I don't notice much of a difference to continue to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Moore

customer_reviews.title: No difference in my daughter’s crazy cat
customer_reviews.text: This came highly recommended by a cat lover friend. I suppose it does chill out some cats. But I see no difference in the behavior of my daughter’s crazy cat. It was worth a try. I was hoping that the cat would get calm enough to allow just a little combing or brushing. No such luck! The cat still will hiss, bite and scratch at any attempts to groom her.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia J. Salim

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: We have a sexually aggressive male cat that spends a good part of his day trying to hassle is 2 (non -blood related) sisters. Our local vet suggested trying Feliaway. We have been using it for 2 months now and are pleasantly surprised to report that his aggressiveness has calmed down substantially. Would definitely recommend to those who are looking for a alternative to oral meds for a overall calming effect on felines.
customer_reviews.author: T. Lentini

customer_reviews.title: ~Looks like it works!
customer_reviews.text: I personaly dont have the Feliway plug-in plugged-in all the time ~I find for my 1 kitty girl it works fine if I just plug it in (in the area she's going to be around) ~times when she seems like she could use a liitle comforting, relaxing kitty confidence boost. so I plug it in for a little while and notice it seems like it always does the trick, in that subtle kitty way~*
customer_reviews.author: Brookey80

customer_reviews.title: Helps soothe my cats.
customer_reviews.text: I use this to eat tensions between my two cats and to soothe my older cat who is really clingy. There's a noticable difference in their behavior and they seem more relaxed. It does leave a residue on the wall above the diffuser, but it cleans up fairly easily. Occasionally I can smell something toasty as the wick dries out, but it's rare and mild.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn F.

customer_reviews.title: Pheromones worked, calmed our cats during move!
customer_reviews.text: The feliway diffuser and pheromones worked great. We used it when we moved from the house where our three cats were raised to a new house. They never seemed stressed and we didn't have any cat accidents in corners. I'm very satisfied that this did its job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazing Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as expected
customer_reviews.text: We were not as impressed with this as expected. Doesn’t appear to be working well for us. We have been trying it for 3 months now and have bought multiple refills. Our cats are at each other’s throats daily. Spray bottles of water work better. :( And this stuff isn’t cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole McCloud

customer_reviews.title: This really helps my girls get along
customer_reviews.text: I have a bonded pair of sister kitties and they are always cuddling and cleaning each other... until they're NOT. They get aggressive and their playing turns a bit too serious at times, like going for biting each other on the butt (and I don't mean base of the tail - I mean right on the bunghole hahaha). When we keep the Feliway plug-ins going, there's a lot more peace under this roof. They still go for the OUCH now and then, but WAAAAY less with Feliway on board.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Lennon Riggio

customer_reviews.title: Helpful but still testing.
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 cats and purchased 3 of these for various parts of house and for coverage. I noticed a bit of cat behavior improvement week by week. I am working on my second purchase of 3 just to give it a fair two month chance for better behavior. A noticed improvement for the better but to date, not to the percentage I need.
customer_reviews.author: K Stone

customer_reviews.title: High  Percentage Comfort Pheromones On Sale!
customer_reviews.text: We've tried multiple brands of pheromones to make our cats & dogs feel safe and at home. Feliway seems to have the most effective level for both species. Nervous picking-Nope! Aggressive growling-Nope! Usually the priciest selection, but this sale price is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! I know that it works because the couple of times I have run out of it, my cat acts completely different. This definitely makes her more calm and lovey. I highly recommend! Warning: if you let the liquid run out but leave the device plugged in, it gets very warm!
customer_reviews.author: Ben M.

customer_reviews.title: STARTED SMOKING
customer_reviews.text: This started smoking! Thank god i was sitting close by and saw/smelled it. When I pulled it out of the socket it burned my hand and i instantly ran it under water to cool it down. NOT safe at all! Would not recommend. Thank goodness I was home
customer_reviews.author: Madeline Kinslow

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: My cat was the grumpiest thing in the world. I started using this after someone recommended it. I honestly figured it wouldn't work. I was a doubter. But my cat is like a whole different cat now. Friendlier. Calmer. More snuggly. He seems more happy since we bought this! 🐈
customer_reviews.author: julie

customer_reviews.title: Works well for cats (and people)
customer_reviews.text: This product has definitely made a difference in my young cat's overall happiness and comfort. This is also an effective way of marking areas as for the cat specifically. I've noticed it also works for moody (cough) partners as well which is a nice benefit to boot. I recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Shycovian

customer_reviews.title: Seemed to work well, we think
customer_reviews.text: Order did not arrive on time. Product seemed to work well to entice my shy cat to spend more time in the living room and just feel more comfortable around people. Or, maybe this just happened coincidentally that we began using the product at a point where she was finally beginning to feel more at home with us . . . hard to say for sure but we got the desired result. Don't believe any reviews about the diffuser melting or becoming a fire hazard. I have used two of these, and neither one leaked, dripped, or overheated in any way (I could easily see this happening if it were plugged in UPSIDE DOWN).
customer_reviews.author: JaggeddyDreamer

customer_reviews.title: Vet recommended
customer_reviews.text: I have two cats and one dog at home. One of the cats is about 2 years old and just a little more nervous. Vet suggested this and they use it in their office. I have used this now for I think two maybe three months and I have noticed a big difference. I place this by their cat tower and they chill nicely.
customer_reviews.author: KE

customer_reviews.title: It Works
customer_reviews.text: Our cats were stressed from moving into a new home. Licking bare spots in their fur. We purchased our first bottle and defuser at the pet store. Took about a month and we started seeing great results. Calms all 3 of them. We have a monthly refil sent from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: kelli

customer_reviews.title: OMG THANK YOU FELIWAY!!
customer_reviews.text: LONG REVIEW ALERT!!! Let me start by saying that I’m a pessimist. Things have to be proven to me before I believe in something. I am a TRUE believer in this product! We have a 15+ year old cat that was howling in the middle of the night. I bought this product, and after about one week she stopped. The pessimist in me thought it was a coincidence or my imagination. However, one day she was acting very strange, including howling or meowing. That’s when I noticed the Feliway was bone dry!!! I installed the new one I had received and within hours, she was back to normal!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina C. Herring

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: I can't smell it, but I can tell a difference in my cat. Our vet was using it in their office and it was the calmest vet visit we've ever had. I bought the spray, too, to help with the outside and car adventures.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Greslick

customer_reviews.title: It worked for my cat!
customer_reviews.text: This pheromone is very effective in calming my (indoor) cat. It was recommended by a vet tech. Easy to use, set it and forget it, until next month. It seems kind of expensive but it still is worth it. I don't smell a thing but obviously my cat does. My cat is a lot happier now!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Product is fine but Delivered to the incorrect address
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure how to let Amazon know this but this item was delivered to my neighbor and I got their package. I wanted to let Amazon know this could have been a problem but all is well now that we swapped packages. The product I assume is fine we will know later if our cats stop hissing at each other after one had a vet visit.
customer_reviews.author: Doug M

customer_reviews.title: Didn't make a difference
customer_reviews.text: I have multiple cats and one of them is very sensitive and easily stressed. I got this specifically for her, but it didn't do much. I think I will try the multiple cat one and see if it makes more of a difference. I don't think the product is defective or anything, it just didn't really help the one I needed it to.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie

customer_reviews.title: Helps calm our combative cat.
customer_reviews.text: This diffuser helps calm my cat in the winter months when she can't go outside as often due to the cold weather. She normally has combative behavior with our other pets when she can't go outside and she is much calmer now that we are using this diffuser.
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: Nervous cat
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't live without this product. I can tell when the diffuser is almost empty. My cat starts chasing the others and rubbing his face furiously on doorways. But when I have one in use, he is an entirely different cat. And that includes out of the box urination. He has stopped doing that altogether. The Comfort product does not work as well for him. I'm not sure why.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Stankevich

customer_reviews.title: Basically anxiety meds for my cat
customer_reviews.text: This is a requirement for one of my cats, as he’s a rescue and has panic attacks when we’re out of the house for long periods of time (rare that we’re gone long, but he freaks when we go). This keeps him from peeing and pooping out of the box and keeps him calm every day. We have another cat as well who doesn’t need it, but he’s not affected negatively by it. Without this, our anxious boy can be a WILD, frantic hell boy that scratches, pees on our bed, and poops on the floor. With it, he’s as sweet as ever and always uses the box appropriately.
customer_reviews.author: SASH

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this before for my past kitties so I knew it worked. I bought this now for a friend (using my diffuser) for her kitty who was having to learn to be an inside only cat instead of inside/outside cat-to calm him down & keep him calm when he gets wound up! Works like a charm! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Ellis

customer_reviews.title: DUELING CATS ARE AT P!
customer_reviews.text: My housemate and I each have a cat. My cat and I have lived in peace for 8 years in this house. When my housemate introduced a kitten into this household, there was no more peace. Finally, I plugged in the diffuser and peace has finally returned to my home!
customer_reviews.author: Jane S. Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be helping
customer_reviews.text: My female cat has suddenly decided she cannot tolerate our male cat (her brother) and nothing we did helped. The hissing and fighting became too much to bear, so the vet suggested this plugin as a possible solution package. It seems to be helping and because I have to plug it in near where I sit in my living room, I am grateful there is no scent for humans.
customer_reviews.author: L.M.M.

customer_reviews.title: It appears to work
customer_reviews.text: Ever since we fostered another cat in our house, or first cat has had issues with urinating outside of her litter box. Even after getting rid of the other cat she would still do her business every once in awhile on the carpet. Since using this she seems to have kept it in the litter box and it is helping her and frankly myself out.
customer_reviews.author: Harold Maxwell Means

customer_reviews.title: Expensive and I didnt see it work
customer_reviews.text: I cant give this a good rating. Its expensive and I'm not sure it really did anything for my cats. I got it for my cat who.is under a lot of stress due to some medical stuff going on right now and.i do t think it did anything :(
customer_reviews.author: S.Kim

customer_reviews.title: Not convinced it makes a difference
customer_reviews.text: I am not fully convinced it makes a difference to the mood of my cat. My vet recommended it so I used it for months then stopped and didn't notice any difference. It doesn't last as long as indicated on the box. I believe that playing and dedicating some time everyday with my cat is having better results.
customer_reviews.author: David Boegler

product_meta.title: Feliway Classic Calming Diffuser Refill (1 Pack, 48 ml) | Reduce Problem, Scratching, Spraying, and Fighting | Constant Calm & Comfort At Home
product_meta.description: Is your cat peeing outside the litter box, scratching your furniture and carpet, or hiding on a regular basis? These behaviors may be caused by fear and anxiety. FELIWAY products are a vet recommended, drug free, and clinically proven to help alleviate many of the unwanted behaviors cat owners deal with. FELIWAY CLASSIC provides “happy messages” by mimicking the natural feline reassuring messages (pheromones) to make cats feel calm and comfortable at home. This product has been found to reduce scratching, spraying, and hiding for 90% of cats, and many owners see results within 7 days. Cats are also very sensitive to change, so if you anticipate changes in the home (moving, renovation, recorating, new pets, new family members, etcs.), FELIWAY is very effective in helping your cats remain calm, and adapt to the changes without unwanted behaviors. The FELIWAY Classic Diffuser Refill includes one refill vial (diffuser sold separately). You should plug your diffuser in the room(s) where your cat spends the most time - each diffuser covers up to 700 sq. feet. Make sure your diffuser isn't covered by curtains, or behind furniture. Each refill can last up to 30 days. For maximum effectiveness, you should replace your diffuser every 6 months. Make sure to follow the instructions when plugging in your diffuser, and plug the diffuser in upright.
feature_bullets: VET RECOMMENDED: Feliway Classic is the #1 vet recommended solution to help cats adjust to challenging situations and curb stress related unwanted behaviors
REDUCES SCRATCHING AND URINE SPRAYING: Clinically proven to reduce scratching and urine spraying in 9/10 cats. Results may be seen as early as 7 days
DRUG FREE SOLUTION: Our diffuser mimics a mother's natural nursing pheromones, which helps to put cats at ease, and reduce conflict among cats

COVERS UP TO 700 SQ FEET: For best results, the Feliway Classic Diffuser should be plugged in continuoulsy in the room where the cat spends the most time, and you should avoid plugging in the diffuser under shelves and behind doors, curtains and furniture
REFILL LASTS UP TO 4 WEEKS: This product is the refill only - you need to purchase a diffuser separately. To maximize effectiveness, replace the vial every 4 weeks, and the diffuser every 6 months

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
